<!-- Scene 0 -->
<speak><p><s><prosody rate="98%">Sun Wukong sits under a peach tree on Flower Fruit Mountain.</prosody></s> <break time="300ms"/> <s><prosody rate="98%">He has a big, juicy peach.</prosody></s> <break time="300ms"/> <s><prosody rate="98%">A tiny bird chirps nearby.</prosody></s></p><break time="1s"/><p><s><prosody rate="98%">Sun Wukong smiles.</prosody></s> <break time="300ms"/> <s><prosody rate="98%">He breaks the peach in half.</prosody></s> <break time="300ms"/> <s><prosody rate="98%">He gives one piece to the little bird.</prosody></s> <break time="500ms"/> <s><prosody rate="100%" volume="+1dB">They eat together and are happy!</prosody></s></p></speak>
